com.google.orkut.client.api
Class BatchTransaction

java.lang.Object
  com.google.orkut.client.api.BatchTransaction

public class BatchTransaction
extends java.lang.Object

Builds a batch request from Transactions. 

 BatchTransaction batch = new BatchTransaction();
 httpRequest = batch.add(transaction1)
      .add(transaction2)
      .add(transaction3)
      .build();

 batch.setResponse(response);

Author:
Sachin Shenoy, Shishir Birmiwal
